title: New To League Help ?
body: hey all just started league and i bought gangplank , is he someone good to learn and can i play him mid lane also ?

replies.body:
Gangplank is traditionally played Top and Mid. He's a little harder than most champions because of his barrel mechanics, so he could take a few weeks to get proficient with.

**Quas** is one of the best top laners in the world, and he has a great guide on him. If you're looking to master Gangplank then I'd recommend checking out his guide [here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-3MV4YlBosk).
